__SqlaTable__.sql:
with rollday as
     (select distinct now()::Date - (7*(ceiling((now()::date - dd.date::date)::numeric / 7.00)))::integer + 6 as rollingweekend
      from common.datedimension dd
      where ceiling((now()::date - dd.date::date)::numeric / 7.00) between 1 and 5 ) select slm.loaddate,
                                                                                            count(distinct skuid) total_sku
   from demandai.sku_loc_metadata_historical slm
   JOIN rollday dd ON slm.loaddate::date = dd.rollingweekend
   where skustatus = true
     and ispeakrowdelete is null
   group by slm.loaddate

select count(distinct skuid) from demandai.mvw_demand_variation
 where 
 percentavgchg >=10

select coalesce(sum((minstocklevel - currentstock)*lastknownrrp), 0) as salesatrisk
   from demandai.mvw_weekly_demand_staticweek
   where demanddate = now()::Date-1
     and currentstock < minstocklevel

select coalesce(sum(forecastsalesamt),0) as sum from demandai.mvw_demand_variation
 where 
 percentavgchg <= (-10)

with rollday as
     (select distinct now()::Date - (7*(ceiling((now()::date - dd.date::date)::numeric / 7.00)))::integer + 6 as rollingweekend
      from common.datedimension dd
      where ceiling((now()::date - dd.date::date)::numeric / 7.00) between 1 and 5 ) select slm.loaddate,
                                                                                            sum ((case
                                                                                                      when sd.costofgoods is null then
                                                                                                             (select costofgoods
                                                                                                              from demandai.sku_loc_demand
                                                                                                              where skuid = slm.skuid
                                                                                                                and locationid = slm.locationid
                                                                                                                and demanddate =
                                                                                                                  (select max(demanddate)
                                                                                                                   from demandai.sku_loc_demand
                                                                                                                   where skuid = slm.skuid
                                                                                                                     and locationid = slm.locationid
                                                                                                                     and slm.loaddate > demanddate
                                                                                                                     and ispeakrowdelete is null ) )
                                                                                                      else costofgoods
                                                                                                  end) * (case
                                                                                                              when sd.currentstock is null then
                                                                                                                     (select currentstock
                                                                                                                      from demandai.sku_loc_demand
                                                                                                                      where skuid = slm.skuid
                                                                                                                        and locationid = slm.locationid
                                                                                                                        and demanddate =
                                                                                                                          (select max(demanddate)
                                                                                                                           from demandai.sku_loc_demand
                                                                                                                           where skuid = slm.skuid
                                                                                                                             and locationid = slm.locationid
                                                                                                                             and slm.loaddate > demanddate
                                                                                                                             and ispeakrowdelete is null ) )
                                                                                                              else currentstock
                                                                                                          end))
   from demandai.sku_loc_metadata_historical slm
   left join demandai.sku_loc_demand sd on slm.skuid = sd.skuid
   and slm.locationid = sd.locationid
   and slm.loaddate = sd.demanddate
   JOIN rollday dd ON slm.loaddate::date = dd.rollingweekend
   where slm.skustatus = true
     and slm.ispeakrowdelete is null
     and sd.ispeakrowdelete is null
   group by slm.loaddate

select coalesce(sum(demand * lastknownrrp),0) currweeksales
 from  demandai.mvw_weekly_demand_staticweek
 where 
 staticweekno = 0

select coalesce(sum((currentstock - maxstocklevel)*costofgoods), 0) as capitalatrisk
   from demandai.mvw_weekly_demand_staticweek
   where demanddate = now()::Date-1
     and currentstock > maxstocklevel

with top4brandforecastsale as 
(
select brand,coalesce(sum(peakforecast * lastknownrrp),0) forecastsale ,weekend::date
from 
demandai.mvw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek sf
where 
sf.staticweekno between 0 and 4
and brand in (select brandwise from demandai.mvw_lastweektop4brand  )
group by brand,weekend
)
select brand,forecastsale,weekend from top4brandforecastsale
union
select slm.skuvariant3 as brandwise,coalesce(sum(sd.demand*sd.lastknownrrp),0) totalsales,weekstart
FROM demandai.mvw_weekly_demand_staticweek sd
 inner JOIN demandai.sku_loc_metadata slm ON slm.skuid::text = sd.skuid::text AND slm.locationid::text = sd.locationid::text
where 
slm.skustatus = true 
and sd.staticweekno between 0 and 1 
and slm.skuvariant3 in (select brandwise from demandai.mvw_lastweektop4brand)
group by slm.skuvariant3,weekstart

select staticweekno,weekstart::date,weekend::date,sum(wg1.demand * wg1.lastknownrrp) totalsalesamt
from 
demandai.mvw_weekly_demand_staticweek wg1
where 
staticweekno between 1 and 4
group by staticweekno,weekstart,weekend

select count(distinct skuid) understocksku 
from demandai.mvw_weekly_demand_staticweek
where
demanddate = now()::Date-1
and currentstock < minstocklevel

select coalesce(sum(forecastsalesamt),0) as sum from demandai.mvw_demand_variation
 where 
 percentavgchg >=10

select count(distinct skuid) overstocksku 
from demandai.mvw_weekly_demand_staticweek
where
currentstock > maxstocklevel 
and demanddate = now()::Date-1

with postcode_sales as (
select staticweekno,weekstart::date,coalesce(sum(demand*lastknownrrp),0) totalsale,postcode
from 
demandai.mvw_locwise_demandsales
where 
staticweekno = 1
and postcode <> ''
group by staticweekno,weekstart,postcode
)
,
top5loc as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,postcode,totalsale,rno from 
(select staticweekno,weekstart,postcode,totalsale, rank() over( order by totalsale desc) rno
from  postcode_sales) as top5
where top5.rno <= 5
),
city_sales as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,coalesce(sum(demand*lastknownrrp),0) totalsale,city
from 
demandai.mvw_locwise_demandsales
where 
staticweekno = 1
and city <> ''
group by staticweekno,weekstart,city
)
,
top5loc_city as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,city,totalsale,rno from 
(select staticweekno,weekstart,city,totalsale, rank() over( order by totalsale desc) rno
from  city_sales) as top5
where top5.rno <= 5
)
,
state_sales as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,coalesce(sum(demand*lastknownrrp),0) totalsale,state
from 
demandai.mvw_locwise_demandsales
where 
staticweekno = 1
and state <> ''
group by staticweekno,weekstart,state
)
,
top5loc_state as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,state,totalsale,rno from 
(select staticweekno,weekstart,state,totalsale, rank() over( order by totalsale desc) rno
from  state_sales) as top5
where top5.rno <= 5
)
,
county_sales as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,coalesce(sum(demand*lastknownrrp),0) totalsale,county
from 
demandai.mvw_locwise_demandsales
where 
staticweekno = 1
and county <> ''
group by staticweekno,weekstart,county
)
,
top5loc_county as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,county,totalsale,rno from 
(select staticweekno,weekstart,county,totalsale, rank() over( order by totalsale desc) rno
from  county_sales) as top5
where top5.rno <= 5
)
,
country_sales as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,coalesce(sum(demand*lastknownrrp),0) totalsale,country
from 
demandai.mvw_locwise_demandsales
where 
staticweekno = 1
and country <> ''
group by staticweekno,weekstart,country
)
,
top5loc_country as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,country,totalsale,rno from 
(select staticweekno,weekstart,country,totalsale, rank() over( order by totalsale desc) rno
from  country_sales) as top5
where top5.rno <= 5
)
,
locdata as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,country as location ,coalesce(sum(demand*lastknownrrp),0),'country' as type
from
demandai.mvw_locwise_demandsales ld 
where 
ld.country in (select country from top5loc_country)
group by staticweekno,weekstart,country
union all
select staticweekno,weekstart,county,coalesce(sum(demand*lastknownrrp),0),'county' as type
from
demandai.mvw_locwise_demandsales ld 
where 
ld.county in (select county from top5loc_county)
group by staticweekno,weekstart,county
union all
select staticweekno,weekstart,state,coalesce(sum(demand*lastknownrrp),0),'state' as type
from
demandai.mvw_locwise_demandsales ld 
where 
ld.state in (select state from top5loc_state)
group by staticweekno,weekstart,state
union all
select staticweekno,weekstart,city,coalesce(sum(demand*lastknownrrp),0),'city' as type
from
demandai.mvw_locwise_demandsales ld 
where 
ld.city in (select city from top5loc_city)
group by staticweekno,weekstart,city
union all
select staticweekno,weekstart,postcode,coalesce(sum(demand*lastknownrrp),0),'postcode' as type
from
demandai.mvw_locwise_demandsales ld 
where 
ld.postcode in (select postcode from top5loc)
group by staticweekno,weekstart,postcode
union all
select lf.staticweekno,
lf.weekend ,lf.country,coalesce(sum(lf.peakforecast*lf.lastknownrrp),0) totalsale,'country' as type
from 
demandai.mvw_locwise_forecastsales lf 
where 
lf.country <> ''
and lf.country in (select country from top5loc_country)
group by staticweekno,weekend,country
union all
select lf.staticweekno,
lf.weekend ,lf.county,coalesce(sum(lf.peakforecast*lf.lastknownrrp),0) totalsale,'county' as type
from 
demandai.mvw_locwise_forecastsales lf 
where 
lf.county <> ''
and lf.county in (select county from top5loc_county)
group by staticweekno,weekend,county
union all
select lf.staticweekno,
lf.weekend ,lf.state,coalesce(sum(lf.peakforecast*lf.lastknownrrp),0) totalsale,'state' as type
from 
demandai.mvw_locwise_forecastsales lf 
where 
lf.state <> ''
and lf.state in (select state from top5loc_state)
group by staticweekno,weekend,state
union all
select lf.staticweekno,
lf.weekend ,lf.city,coalesce(sum(lf.peakforecast*lf.lastknownrrp),0) totalsale,'city' as type
from 
demandai.mvw_locwise_forecastsales lf 
where 
lf.city <> ''
and lf.city in (select city from top5loc_city)
group by staticweekno,weekend,city
union all
select lf.staticweekno,
lf.weekend ,lf.postcode,coalesce(sum(lf.peakforecast*lf.lastknownrrp),0) totalsale,'postcode' as type
from 
demandai.mvw_locwise_forecastsales lf 
where 
lf.postcode <> ''
and lf.postcode in (select postcode from top5loc)
group by staticweekno,weekend,postcode
)
select *
from locdata

select count(distinct skuid) from demandai.mvw_demand_variation
 where 
 percentavgchg <= (-10)

with top4categoryforecastsale as
     (select category,
             coalesce(sum(peakforecast * lastknownrrp), 0) forecastsale,
             weekend::date
      from demandai.mvw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek sf
      where sf.staticweekno between 0 and 1
        and category in
          (select categorywise
           from demandai.mvw_lastweektop4category)
      group by category,
               weekend) select category,
                               forecastsale,
                               weekend
   from top4categoryforecastsale
   union select slm.skuvariant2 as categorywise,
                coalesce(sum(sd.demand*sd.lastknownrrp), 0) totalsales,
                weekstart
   FROM demandai.mvw_weekly_demand_staticweek sd
   inner JOIN demandai.sku_loc_metadata slm ON slm.skuid::text = sd.skuid::text
   AND slm.locationid::text = sd.locationid::text
   where slm.skustatus = true
     and sd.staticweekno between 0 and 4
     and slm.skuvariant2 in
       (select categorywise
        from demandai.mvw_lastweektop4category)
   group by slm.skuvariant2,
            weekstart

select 'Revenue Profile SKU Units' as profile,
          peakcategory1 as peak_category,
          coalesce(count(DISTINCT skuid), 0) totaluniqueskuid
   from demandai.mvw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek
   where staticweekno = 1
   group by peakcategory1
   union select 'Demand Profile SKU Units' as profile,
                peakcategory2,
                coalesce(count(DISTINCT skuid), 0) totaluniqueskuid
   from demandai.mvw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek
   where staticweekno = 1
   group by peakcategory2
   union select 'Demand Profile SKU Units' as profile,
                peakcategory3,
                coalesce(count(DISTINCT skuid), 0) totaluniqueskuid
   from demandai.mvw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek
   where staticweekno = 1
   group by peakcategory3
   union select 'Demand Profile SKU Units'  as profile,
                peakcategory4,
                coalesce(count(DISTINCT skuid), 0) totaluniqueskuid
   from demandai.mvw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek
   where staticweekno = 1
   group by peakcategory4
   union select 'Demand Profile SKU Units' as profile,
                peakcategory5,
                coalesce(count(DISTINCT skuid), 0) totaluniqueskuid
   from demandai.mvw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek
   where staticweekno = 1
   group by peakcategory5

select weekend::date,
          coalesce(sum(peakforecast*lastknownrrp), 0) totalforecastamount
   from demandai.mvw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek
   where staticweekno in (0,
                          1)
   group by weekend
   union select weekstart,
                coalesce(sum(wg1.demand * wg1.lastknownrrp), 0) totalsalesamt
   from demandai.mvw_weekly_demand_staticweek wg1
   where staticweekno between 1 and 4
   group by weekstart
   order by 1
